label.@value: Chemical burn due to skin contact with corrosive substance
Acute skin injury due to skin contact with corrosive substance

title.@value: Skin injury due to exposure to corrosive substances

definition.@value: Damage to the skin caused by contact with corrosive or caustic substances. These include acids, alkalis and a large range of other agents (e.g. wet cement, phenolic compounds, peroxides, halogenated solvents).
